description:
Conan, Haibara, Ayumi, Genta, and Mitsuhiko go to a villa owned by Professor Agasa`s acquaintance where they discover injured hacker Isehara. Isehara was formerly an accomplice of Mizorogi, a robber known as Zorro, but now Mizorogi is trying to kill him after his betrayal. Conan rescues Isehara and flees from Mizorogi and his henchmen, but they are cornered on a cliff. Conan tries to stop Isehara from falling when his foot slips while evading an arrow show from Mizorogi`s crossbow, but the two of them fall over the edge together...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La disparition de Conan au bord d`une falaise, 1re partie
断崖に消えたコナン (前編)
